column4: i'm trying to enable vga_switcheroo, and i have modeset=1, but i can't get it to work, these are my kernel options: GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet splash acpi_osi=Linux modeset=1"  and updated grub.  but /sys/kernel/debug/vgaswitcheroo isn't there
is the linux-headers package also installed for this kernel?
@kernel headers, i don't know, how do i check that?
type "linux-headers" in your software manager and make sure the correct version is installed
